channel.title: awk on Geophydog
channel.description: Recent content in awk on Geophydog

item.title: Awk notes
item.description: 1 Remove repeated lines Sometimes we want to remove these repeated lines according to some column(s). 1 awk '!a[$2,$3]++' pushLog.log Above command will print the unique lines after removing repeated in columns 2 and 3. For instance, there are some SAC files with same header gcarc, and can use the following command to achieve that. 1 saclst gcarc f *.SAC | sort -k2 -n -r | awk '!
